item.description:
Everything you wanted to know about SEX....Â 
(And a bunch of stuff that you don't know that you really should.)

Saturday April 6th

7pm - 9pm

Cost $50

A workshop on Sexuality By Michelle Thibeault and Lisa Campion

This workshop is for men and women. Adults only.

Welcome to this workshop on sex and sexuality, Michelle and Lisa's favorite topics. We will be covering the waterfront here working to help you become more familiar and comfortable with this essential part of you. It's worth the price of admission just to hear Michelle give her lecture on proper urination techniques for woman and I am sorry to tell you that you are probably doing it all wrong! Yikes...

This workshop will cover TONS of things that you don't know that really should know.

* Female Anatomy

* Physiology of Sex

* The Arousal Cycle

* Basic Tantric principals

* Sex as a spiritual and energetic practice

*The three different types orgasms for women- and why you need all three!

Michelle and Lisa have so much fun doing this and will crack you and each other up throughout the workshop.

Email Lisa to register at lisa@lisacampion.com
item.name: Everything you wanted to know about SEX....
